amendment.description: To set aside an amount of Navy RDT&E funding for the development and fabrication of composite sail test articles for incorporation into designs for future submarines.

vote.text: Amendment SA 723 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 723 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S6896) To set aside an amount of Navy RDT&E funding for the development and fabrication of composite sail test articles for incorporation into designs for future submarines.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 723 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 723 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott.
